title: BRIEF-India's Ambuja Cements Sept-Qtr Profit Rises
text:
BRIEF-India's Ambuja Cements Sept-Qtr Profit Rises

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 17:06)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Ambuja Cements Sept-Qtr Profit Rises Oct 18 (Reuters) - Ambuja Cements Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER PROFIT 2.35 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 1.79 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * SEPT QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 26.26 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 26.14 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * SEPT QUARTER CEMENT SALES VOLUME 5.23 MILLION TONNES VERSUS 5.46 MILLION TONNES LAST YEAR * AMBUJA CEMENTS LTD CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR SEPT QUARTER PROFIT WAS 2.93 BILLION RUPEES

BRIEF-India's Ambuja Cements Sept-Qtr Profit Rises
description: BRIEF-India's Ambuja Cements Sept-Qtr Profit Rises
